typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		VendorID as integer,
		PickUpDate as date,
		PickUpDateTime as timestamp,
		DropOffDate as date,
		DropOffDateTime as timestamp,
		PassengerCount as integer,
		TripDistance as double,
		PickUpLocationID as integer,
		PickUpLocationZone as string,
		PickUpLocationBorough as string,
		DropOffLocationID as integer,
		DropOffLocationZone as string,
		DropOffLocationBorough as string,
		PaymentTypeID as integer,
		PaymentTypeDescription as string,
		FareAmount as decimal(8,2),
		ExtraAmount as decimal(8,2),
		MTATaxAmount as decimal(8,2),
		TipAmount as decimal(8,2),
		TollsAmount as decimal(8,2),
		ImprovementSurchargeAmount as decimal(8,2),
		TotalRideAmount as decimal(8,2),
		PickUpYearMonth as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	format: 'parquet',
	wildcardPaths:['*']) ~> NyC_Curated
